<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:enchantments}}: Contains a map of each of this item's [[enchantment]]s to its enchantment level. This and <code>[[Data component format#enchantable|minecraft:enchantable]]</code> must exist on an item for it to be able to be enchanted in an enchanting table. If present on an item, the color of the item name is aqua if its rarity is {{cd|common}} or {{cd|uncommon}}, and light purple if its rarity is {{cd|rare}} or {{cd|epic}}. If present on an item, the enchantments are listed in the item's tooltip. The order of the enchantments in the tooltip is defined by the <code>[[Enchantment_tag_(Java_Edition)#tooltip_order|#minecraft:tooltip_order]]</code> enchantment tag.
*** {{nbt|int|''<enchantment ID>''}}: A single key-value pair, where the key is the [[resource location]] of an enchantment, and the value is the level.</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
